attributes.action: Make racist abuse and attacks on white people a criminal offence
attributes.background: For too long white people have been attacked and abused and then let down by the police force.And told the victims of abuse that it was not a racist attacks on white innocent people and we demand a law that attacks on innocent white people will be a criminal offence.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Existing laws already provide for criminal offences relating to conduct in cases where the offender is motivated by hostility or hatred towards the victim's race. It is unclear what other action you would like Parliament or Government to take. 

You can find out more here:

http://www.cps.gov.uk/legal/p_to_r/racist_and_religious_crime/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
